nodes.text: Sith warriors were warriors who served the Sith. As part of the Sith Code, each Sith warrior upheld the values of limitless strength, power, and victory and had to be willing to do anything to achieve their goals as Dark Lords of the Sith. Sometime during their existence, a sect of Dowutin Sith warriors created the Sword of Khashyun. The Sith apprentice to Darth Sidious, Darth Maul, held the title of Sith warrior. After Maul was presumed dead during the Battle of Naboo, Sidious elected to take on a new apprentice, though Maul had actually survived and retained his warrior title.
